column1: Little Goat Diner////It's pretty good. Some of the menu can be a little intimidating for my taste
column2: but that's okay they've got the classics and they nail it. Go all out though
column4: get some bacon and add some hash browns!!  Make a breakfast reservation and if you order right
column5: you'll only need 2 meals in your day. Good size portions
column6: awesome service that lets you chill and keeps the waters full.  Highly recommend even if it's a but out of the way.
